name: The Widsith
description: A heavy notebook filled with musical scores. Though suffering from moth damage and heavy wear-and-tear, there is still much power to be found among the hand-written words within.
effect: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by {0}. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by {1}. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by {2}.
